name: pinned-tabs

2.3.1.name: pinned-tabs
2.3.1.description: An Atom package that allows you to pin tabs

animated.title: Enable animations
animated.description: Tick this to enable all animation related to pinned tabs

closeUnpinned.title: Enable the 'Close Unpinned Tabs' option
closeUnpinned.description: Tick this to show the 'Close Unpinned Tabs' from the context menu

pinButton.title: Enable pin button on tabs
pinButton.description: Tick this to add a button to unpinned tabs to pin them

enum.description: Don't use this feature
Only show this when I hover over the tab
Always show this when a tab is modified

visualstudio.title: Visual Studio style pinning
visualstudio.description: When _Visual Studio style pinning_ is enabled pinned tabs wno't shrink. Instead, the closing button is replaced by an indicator that the tab is now pinned.
